website_summaries.verdict: A steam-powered roller set that requires regular maintenance, this affordable tool is the best budget deal.
pros: Includes carrying case and style guide
cons: Potential exists for water corrosion and mineral build-up

customer_reviews.title: Family tradition!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandmother always said nothing curls like Caruso's and this is my first set as an adult on a schedule! Love the quick set-up and take down. Have used for all day curls, to get a "spruce" up, and the night before for the "bed curls" look. Comes with so many that you can EASILY do your whole head. I have around 20-22 inches of hair and I had no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Pr0n_Queen

customer_reviews.title: Nope, didn’t work for us...
customer_reviews.text: These suck! My daughters hair is very thick and straight. These rollers will NOT curl her hair no matter which technique I use to roll it, no matter that I steam the clips and rollers for max time, it’s not happening. The rollers make the hair damp and that dampness is held in with the plastic clips that cover the entire roller. I left them on forever and still the hair was still somewhat damp and the curl fell out almost immediately. I used almost EVERY roller in the box, I wasn’t putting too much hair on the rollers. The search continues....
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for all hair types!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try instead of using flat iron or curlers. I was super skeptical because my hair is not cooperative many times. I watched YouTube videos to see tricks and how to use (Do It!!) and this was my 1st run. It worked awesome! I used the jumbo rollers to get beachy wave look. It was easy, no problem at all. I also did on my daughter's stringy shoulder length hair, worked awesome! Don't put silkers or products in hair to smooth as it may prevent good curls.
customer_reviews.author: Seja

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best styling product I own!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this set back in 2015, but it still works perfectly and gets used at least a couple of times a month. I have fine/curly hair that frizzes easily and these leave my hair smooth and shiny. I absolutely love how easy the process is, and that they aren't causing heat damage when I use them. 100% recommend these for anyone with curly or wavy hair who wants an easy way to get big, shiny, smooth barrel curls
customer_reviews.author: Crystal V.

customer_reviews.title: Order at your own risk... Can't return it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't give me any curls at all. I followed the directions, so either my hair wouldn't cooperate or I possibly got a defective one? I have very thick, straight and fine hair (the hardest to curl). I tried to return it and Amazon says I can't. I'm upset because nowhere does it say you CAN'T return it. I wouldn't have ordered this if I knew I couldn't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Caruso C97953 30 Molecular Steam Hairsetter with 30 Rollers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Caruso from Amazon. I have used a Caruso probably for the past 15 - 20 years and I loved them... but mine as just wore out for all the use... now I purchased it from amazon and the product doesn't work!!!!!!!! I am so upset because I was going on vacation in two weeks and now won't have this Caruso... There were even rollers that didn't have the insides... what a joke. I want my money back and I'll find another place to purchase it. As of today Sept 14, it stoped working al together... NO ONE FROM AMAZON HAS CONTACTED ME REGARDING MY Purchase... that didn't work at all NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Faith White 588 49th ave NE, Columbia Heights, MN 55421 phone:  763-572-1862

customer_reviews.title: Gave them to Goodwill
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with these curlers. The concept sounded great. Moist heat, soft curls, good for your hair. Well, the concept behind them might be great, but.... The rollers are easy to use but the plastic caps left creases in my hair. My hair is very healthy, not permed, not colored and about two inches below my shoulders. The largest rollers left tight curls in my hair. I read the manual many times and experimented with the various settings and techniques. The curlers ended up in the Goodwill bag. They may work better for someone with short hair.....?
customer_reviews.author: Jackie oh

customer_reviews.title: Frizz.....
customer_reviews.text: Hot rollers work well on my hair to eliminate frizz and give organization and body to my cut. Given the reviews, I thought these would do this as well. That did not turn out to be the case. I would call this a complete fail on my dry, fine, curly hair. They are going back.
customer_reviews.author: Pegeen O'Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Non returnable. Not for course straight hair!
customer_reviews.text: Not for course straight Asian hair. It straightened itself within 3 hours. And it's not returnable! It had such good reviews I wanted to try it but it is a commitment so buy it somewhere else with a good reurn policy. Or contact me because it takes up way too much space with the curlers that I will sell it to you for half the price. I tried it twice and it just doesn't work on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Almost started a fire
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this product for 9 months. In the past, I have had several Caruso steam roller sets but this is the second one of this style and I have had problems with both. This one just went off like a fire cracker shortly after turning it on. I would have been injured if I had been standing next to it. Very dangerous. Luckily it didn’t start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hagedorn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I've watched multiple tutorials on youtube with these rollers. I've tried them on clean hair, one day old dirty hair, two day old dirty hair and 4 day old dirty hair. I've tried with different curling products, preheat spray, hairspray and without product. I simply cannot get my hair to hold a curl with these the same way I can with a curling wand. I'm rating 3 stars instead of 1 because the overall product quality is nice, and they shipped quickly. However, I cannot get my hair to hold a curl which was the purpose that I bought them for. I get a wave at best right after I take them out, but it doesn't last long. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alayne

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, they don't even take returns.
customer_reviews.text: Curls look great at first and then die fast. Also too time consuming to wait for the hair to dry from the steamed roller. Regular hot rollers are much faster. I am also HIGHLY disappointed that I didn't realize returns are not accepted. Waste of $$$ these will just go in the trash. I am so upset with this purchase. Everything I read about it on the internet must have been fake promotions
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This is not like the original Caruso!
customer_reviews.text: My First original Caruso was wonderful!! And this newer Caruso system im not pleased. First, they changed the amount of water level which wasn't enough for curling my short fine hair. And the original took salt in the water..it was STEAM! Then they changed the color of the rollers which is ok, but when using the extra small and small I couldn't tell the difference between the sizes to slip the correct roller holder on. And you have to make sure you put them exactly on the roller or they wouldn't snap on. I'm returning this because of my disappointments. I'm not pleased with this new system.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Only for straight hair
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with the final outcome this roller gives to already voluminous, dry hair. It makes your hair PUFF up. Next day the hair looks worse. The heat makes your hair dryer. I would have loved it if my hair was straight and flat. This roller set will be useless on African American hair type. I normally use velcro Rollers and love the results but don’t like the 4 hour I have to keep it on my head. In that sense this roller is VERY quick. Just the results are not great.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure...
customer_reviews.text: In theory they work but I have yet to get results I am happy with. I was trying to cut down on the time it takes to do a blow out by using the rollers to finish. My hair is below my shoulders and thick with some natural wave. So far my hair just feels heavy and the curl is not much to look at when done. It curls, just not coming out smooth and I end up putting in a pony. : ( Will give it a few more tries with less steam on rollers, etc. see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Cool Concept, Have to Keep Practicing
customer_reviews.text: I think I am still learning on these. These definitely achieve that sexy, wavy beach look with very little time and effort. I also love that they are so much better for your hair than direct heat. Keeps the hair healthy and strong. I just have to keep playing around to figure out how to create a tighter more vintage looking curl with them. But I really love the idea of using the steam rather than a curling iron to achieve all day curls.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Styling!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using steam rollers for years; they don't damage my hair in any way. I needed a replacement for my original Helen of Troy and am so glad I got this one. First, it's more compact than my original, which also required the use of salt and this model is more convenient. It steams quickly and the rollers heat up within a minute. My hair is not thin but it's fine (it greatly helps to have a stylist cut your hair accordingly.) After I remove the rollers, I don't brush it, only run my fingers through it to fluff it up. The curls stay all day - that's it and done! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Riorita

customer_reviews.title: I love this! My hair is thick and naturally wavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My hair is thick and naturally wavy but with the thickness of my hair, the waves can be weight out. This Caruso really pulls the wavy mess out and compliments my hair so much! I’m not a fan of the clasps that hold the rollers on. I think it’s hard to do on my own but I got giant clips that hold the rollers in place instead,’way easier to do in my Own.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: What a great plastic snap bag for the curlers.
customer_reviews.text: Love this easy curling hair setter. It does not ruin my hair. It curls so quickly and easily. I can get a great look with out much effort. I read all directions first before starting and reminded myself of a few of the more important not getting shocked rules. Went easily. I barely got all the curlers in and then I got company and had to tear them out as fast as I put them in. Great curls and look!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Clips didn't stay in place. Long dry time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give these a try based on reviews. First I'll explain the cons. My biggest issue is that the clips do not have a tight fit so don't hold the curls tight. I repeatedly had problems with them slipping down or falling out completely. Causes the curls to be more focused at the ends. Dry time also seems pretty long for long hair. Pros- the rollers that do stay in place do produce cute bouncy curls but felt they lost the hold rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Nice curl, had to try them
customer_reviews.text: I like this set because it gives a good curl and your hair feels soft. Only drawback for me is it takes me a while to use them. Maybe I'll get faster with time. I need larger curls though so bought a set of flocked rollers in bigger sizes. Since they are sponge rollers, even if you use the big ones you might wrap the curl tighter and the roller compresses so you get a smaller curl.
customer_reviews.author: ladyjean

customer_reviews.title: Best hair steam curlers on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Caruso! The first I had for over a dozen years and only lost it due to a move and it was never found again. Ordered another. The 2nd one was on it's 6th year when a friend begged and begged to use it and then not only never returned it, but moved! So here I am on my 3rd, thrilled to have it back, will not lend it, will not move, it's staying right here with me. Easy to use, quick, makes your hair extra shiny and holds those curls for days. Nothing can top Caruso!
customer_reviews.author: JennyDTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: How did I forget how good these were?!
customer_reviews.text: Best drunk shopping purchase ever! My friend and I were drinking and reminiscing on how we used these in elementary school in the 90’s. I couldn’t resist ordering one. Holy crap! I forgot how fast they were and how big the curls are. It gives you a lot more volume than a curling iron and I forgot that steam rollers don’t give you indentions like hot rollers. I am missing 3 rollers though. Will contact seller regarding that but overall thrilled that we drank wine that night! 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Urban Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Like product however using it once made my hair so curly I couldn’t brush hair. I’m 65 female with course red hair with natural wave. My hair always has curled easily. This was easy to use. Just need softer curls not so tight. If it came with 3” rollers my hair would respond better. If you want curls you will definitely get them with this!
customer_reviews.author: Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting curls with no hair damage
customer_reviews.text: Had a set years ago. I used them until the sponge in the curlers disintegrated. I was happy to see them online. I thought since it was so long ago, they were discontinued. I love them. Curls last for days. It uses steam, so there's no damage to hair. It just dampens the hair, so it dries quickly. I am so glad I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brewster Meza

customer_reviews.title: The small rollers give a nice tight curl that last all day
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my review because the company replaced my entire Caruso set. The customer service was very good. I have a chin length slightly angled bob, so I used all the smallest rollers to get the curl I need with a few of the medium. The small rollers give a nice tight curl that last all day. The second day I'm able to comb through my hair, and the result is a nice wave without re-curling. The downside is that I'm disappointed since half of the small rollers have "clips" that are too big to hold the roller in place. I will need to return the set unless the seller will replace the small rollers.
customer_reviews.author: KKM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Curls
customer_reviews.text: I liked the results and will continue to use it for special occasions. The curls were great and lasted into the next day. Made my hair shiny and fuller looking. The downside was the amount of time it took - 3 minutes per roller (for my hair length and texture) X 10 rollers = 30 minutes at least. I also had to blow dry the rollers so probably 40 minutes total. Too time consuming for me to use routinely.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Adore this product!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought me my first Caruso set in my early teens and I used it right up to last summer when the curlers finally disintegrated as I pulled them out of my perfect curls. Almost twenty years I used those and they were finally gone. I was heartbroken. Thankfully, they're still available online! I haven't gotten to use my new set but aside from a new look for the steamer, the curlers seem to be the exact same thing. I have no doubt they'll create the same beautiful shiny curls I'm used to! Thank you, Caruso for an amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I want
customer_reviews.text: Now I don't have to where curler in my hair when I go to bed. Blow dry my hair and put these in looks much nicer. I used these years ago and remembered found them and so glad I did. I got to tell mom she's always running a round with bobby pins for curls she will love this and no heat damage yahh Thanks so much!!! I ordered yesterday got them today way cool concert tonight I'm a happy :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt curl- non RETURNABLE. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this set is crap. Steam wil burn you. Doesnt seem to hold curl very well. Big bulky and messy system Extremely disappointed. Buyer beware- this item is NON RETURNABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for travel.  Not for fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for traveling, but it will take up more space than what I have now. Very disappointing. And I dislike the way they work. I guess I’m used to clips; having all that extra plastic around clacking is annoying. Doesn’t hold my fine hair as well as a hard roller either. And of course not returnable. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Little Hail Storm

customer_reviews.title: Better off just using my flat iron for softer curls
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. I have curly hair. Thought thiswould give me softer curls if used on dry hair. Nope, it just wets the hair and makes frizzy curls. Better off just using my flat iron for softer curls, or just go natural.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia T.

customer_reviews.title: Curls My Stubborn Fine Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair that does not hold a curl. These rollers are the only thing I've ever found that get my hair to hold a curl. The only downside I found is my hair easily got tangled when removing the curlers. Extra care and time is needed to remove them without tangling.
customer_reviews.author: Meg P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Rollers and Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only rollers that I can use for my hair. My hair is very thick and fine and I've tried every type of hair rollers on the market and the Caruso molecular rollers are the only ones that will actually curl my hair and will hold the curls for 4 hours without hairspray before they fall. Best rollers ever and so worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: You get a clear plastic tote (no zipper) to store the curlers in. The packaging is not a suitable substitute for a container that would hold all the curlers and steaming unit together for tidy storage. The steamer itself only holds one curler at a time. I suppose that is because the material on the soft curlers would not last long if the device heated them all simultaneously. It was over priced for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Stutler

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The water in this machine heats up quickly and it’s easy to heat the individual rollers. I had been concerned that it would take a long time to curl my hair since the rollers are heated one by one but a new one was ready by the time I got the previously roller in my hair. There was no slow down at all. The only challenge I had was putting the covers on the rollers to secure them in place. I didn’t want them to partially unroll when I let go. That may very well be my own personal challenge and will get better as I use them more. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 50 years old, and at 30 I had a set of these and loved them. So when I came across it her I got so excited. It’s very easy to use and just as I remember them to be. Since it’s a moist heat my hair does not dry out. I dye my hair every 6 weeks so my hair gets dry and I use a lot of biotin in it. The combination of the moist heat curlers and biotin leave my hair soft and shinning. It’s so nice to take so little time with my hair, it curls and dries quickly. Just use caution because there is steam coming out of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: PhilnLisa

customer_reviews.title: I was happy when I just searched for it on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a replacement system and rollers for awhile. I was happy when I just searched for it on Amazon. I needed a new system and rollers. After a lot of use the rollers tear up, but that is what you expect after years and years of use. I like that it doesn't make my hair wet when using it. One steamer I purchased had my hair soaking wet. This one by Caruso is the best. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: JR MOM

customer_reviews.title: The curls do no stay.
customer_reviews.text: Curls do not stay. I was careful not to over saturate the curlers as suggested and I also tried using more steam. The problem with the later method, it leaves ur hair damp and drying hair on foam curlers is defiantly a problem. Total waste of my money unless I wear the curlers all day. I’m curious how anyone had good results. BTW my hair is wavy.
customer_reviews.author: Laurion228

customer_reviews.title: Best rollers EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best curlers I have ever used, and I've been through many sets over the years! This is the only one that holds curls for two days. I live on the Texas coast - mega humidity. Normally, with lots of product my curl would last a couple of hours. With minimal product, Caruso gives me lasting curls!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for ME, after my high hopes :-(((
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely fine, limp hair, and I wanted to find something that would allow me to set my hair with minimum damage to my hair. I had high hopes for this product, but it didn't deliver:-(. No matter how soon I try to take the roller off the steamer, it always is too damp. I end up having to blow dry the rollers in my hair over and over and over again, but still, when I take the rollers off, my hair still is damp-AND IT FLOPS RIGHT DOWN INTO ITS limp, fine, straight nothingness. The caps that keep the rollers on my head are solid plastic, which prevents the hair from drying adequately. I'm disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I love them - my 4th set over the past 20 years
customer_reviews.text: I love these - my hair is super straight - really thick, but very fine. These are the only curlers that will hold a curl for more than 1/2 hour. I have had my hair stay curled for most of the day with some relaxation, but WAY better than anything else I've used
customer_reviews.author: Nanni

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I found product to be on the cheap side of plastic, and sizes are not color coded. They don't hold well on thin hair, its a real challenge to use. I could have choose a better one, not thinking there would be that much difference!~
customer_reviews.author: Rita M. Dyrness

customer_reviews.title: This may
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product does not live up to everything the advertisement says or as it is hyped up to be in the video... I was hoping that this product could give me the curls that I wanted that would last throughout the day but unfortunately the curls fell out within 30 minutes even with the following the instructions as stated and the curlers were always more wet then anything hot
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome update to a classic curler
customer_reviews.text: I owned the older model, which bellowed steam in huge quantities. With this new machine, the steam looked a lot weaker. However, it still works just as well to curl hair (and I didnt have to refill the water tank 3 times). To curl long hair, it took about 40 minutes to wrap the curlers (I used 27 of the 30). I also let my hair sit for 25 minutes (until the curlers had cooled) before removing them. I have long fine hair that is difficult to curl with an iron. These curlers gave me the tight corkscrew spirals I was hoping to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: Fun, bouncy curls without damaging hair!
customer_reviews.text: These are a very fun alternative to hot rollers or a curling iron, suggested by my hairdresser. Does not take a lot of time or skill. Worth the price and a fun option for all day style or quick fix for an evening out. Be careful twisting hair onto roller, some hairs can tangle and tear on the sponge material. Try with the different sizes provided then opt for add on package of rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Burns

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Just got it at my door when I got home and could not wait to try it for this evening. Put the rollers in while I was doing some paperwork and OMG!!! The curls came out SOFT and well curled with BODY and NO FRIZZ and NO DRY CRUNCHY ENDS! I treated my hair badly while on a beach vacation and the ends are very light, and very dry. Using my curling iron was really bad on my hair despite my deep conditioning, etc. This seems to correct the damage! Can't say enough.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: The only size that is useful is the jumbo
customer_reviews.text: Although this item is an Amazon prime, it cannot be returned. I bought it because I thought I could try and see if it would work. The problem is that if you have ANY natural curl to your hair, the steam from the roller makes your hair frizzy at the roots. The only size that is useful is the jumbo. There are only six of those. All the other curlers are so tiny that curls are ridiculously tight.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Big 80s Hair
customer_reviews.text: I missed my big 80s hair. These steam rollers give me so much volume and bouncy curls that last all day. Easy to use, the clips stay in and are comfortable. 20 minutes after I put them in they are ready. I can't say enough good things about these rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these for my wife for years. They work great for her and it lets her hair hold curl without damaging the hair. The only complaint is that the foam wears out too quick. But still lasts several years. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. Creates long lasting beautiful curls
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Caruso. I had the original when you had to add salt. This thing is amazing. Creates long lasting beautiful curls, non damaging steam, AND the rollers actually stay in and don't get tangled in the hair. My 10 yo loves it, she's always afraid of getting burnt with an iron, no worries with this. Buy one, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMiMi

customer_reviews.title: Did not work - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. I have brown hair (not color treated) that is about 2 - 3 inches below shoulders. Read many reviews that said these steam rollers were the best choice for hard to curl hair. The curls fall out almost instantly for me, even with hairspray. Also, there were only 29 rollers in the box and two extra empty caps. I don't usually write reviews, but hope to save someone else money from my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new set of Caruso Steam rollers. I pondered purchasing these for several months before I pulled the trigger. Now I wish I had discovered these soon. They work wonders on my thin fine hair...amazing volume and lasting curls. I would definitely purchase again and highly recommend to others, especially if you are looking for a way to get volume, shine, and curl without the damage of other hot tools.
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: 10 pit of 10 from a licensed cosmetologist
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensee cosmetologist and I love these for everyday use. It curls my hair I throw on some quick make up and then I take them out and shake with my fingers. I use the medium ones, I have hair a little below my shoulders and I twist the hair around the rod like you do a wand and secure with the shield. The longer you leave them in, the longer the curl stays but it will curl even if left on for 10 minute depending in hair type. I try not to use a lot of heat on my hair as I already bleach it so this is a great way to curl it using minimal heat
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth sisco

customer_reviews.title: Love them,,
customer_reviews.text: Love this Use setting setting lotion, and keep them in a bit longer than others ,but it's worth it ! Because the curls stay MUCH Longer ! And I use a cap style dryer and or a regular dryer a bit on them ..if I have time is when I use these..Not for everyday use..unless I have Time...But I do Love them...
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Cannot return this item.
customer_reviews.text: This item came with all the curlers loose in the box, like it had been used previously. When I used it for the first time, the steam barely comes out and the curlers did not get hot enough to curl my hair without frizzing. When I tried to return it, Amazon tells me it’s not eligible for return. First time that’s ever happened.
customer_reviews.author: PattyV

customer_reviews.title: Frizzy hair beware
customer_reviews.text: If you have frizzy hair at all, these will not work. The moisture just intensified the frizziness, even when setting the rollers with the blow dryer. Also very upset because I tried 2 days after receiving the item, the details on Amazon day that I can return until February, but when I go to process the return I get a message saying the item is not returnable. If you want to try, I suggest buying at Wal-Mart, or another beauty supplier where your returns are guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Courtney Schraub

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Terrible and unsafe. The steam unit doesn’t sit securely in the base. Some of the rollers need to be pushed hard on to the unit to get enough steam to heat up and then caused me to burn myself when it was difficult to get off the steam unit. After all that the curls fell out within an hour. ITEM CANNOT BE RETURNED
customer_reviews.author: Dianna K

customer_reviews.title: Works great, cult product for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool, I never knew this type of roller existed. I got a shorter hair cut than I've pretty much ever had and found myself in need of an effective way to make my hair look styled (my hair's too short to wear up all the time now). This heats up quick and makes my hair look cute and healthy. It also is way more forgiving than sleeping in rollers or even hot rollers. The ends on my hair stay pretty smooth and the curls brush out nicely. My recommendation is to check out youtube for tutorials and tips from long-time users. Sticking the cap on the steam for a few seconds definitely helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT, SELLER WONT ALLOW RETURN
customer_reviews.text: Save your money - Bad seller return policy!!! I had high hopes for this product, as I was trying to replace my curling iron with less damaging steam rollers. Unfortunately, when I tried to plug the rollers in, the plug doesn't work. I tried several outlets, and all my other electric devices work in them without a hitch, so I know it's the plug and not the outlet. When I tried to return the product, I received a message that the seller does not allow returns. Save your money and better to buy another brand, AND recommend you SKIP AMAZON and buy from a seller with a reasonable return policy like Bed Bath & Beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: it is best just one chemical only
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for hot roll for years , I am cosmetologist and concerned the healthy hair are most important, if have hair color treatments, it is best just one chemical only , not with perm solution . When I found out from Amazon website, almost that I found the treasure , I bought right away and try use on my medium length hair have 6 time already, the curl are soft and bouncing, creates hair volume , I will recommend to my client and friend , if they like to protect their health hair .
customer_reviews.author: Borisio

customer_reviews.title: It's true--not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: The rollers didn't work for me. Clips didn't stay on rollers on top of my head, so rollers flopped or fell out. (Hair probably too thin.) Drying time was at least a half hour--not ten or fifteen minutes--but it's hard to determine when rollers are hot enough, so maybe they were too wet. I can see that they might work for some people. Mostly, I just want to warn you that this item is not returnable. I saw nothing on the main page or checkout page telling me this ahead of time. I used the product once and am now stuck with it. Would not have bought it if I'd known it was nonreturnable.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Soft, touchable curls
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite beauty product. For some reason, the curlers create very soft hair no matter what size roller you use so you never get the dried- out look that repeated use of a curling iron sometimes causes. It's old-fashioned and low-tech, but it really works and I can go for more than a week between shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: hubbleson

customer_reviews.title: Bouncy long lasting curls
customer_reviews.text: These are a little more time consuming than I had anticipated, I was hoping for something to make my morning routine a little quicker HOWEVER the upside is that you will be rewarded for your time investment with bouncy, long lasting curls. The product arrived as described and super quick ship, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae A

customer_reviews.title: Heats super fast, very essy to transport.
customer_reviews.text: They heat up fast. The base it very lightweight. Works as described. Easy to transport. if you have long hair its a good idea to purchase the extra rollers available to save time. They work well. Heats up super fast which is very very helpful. If you have to travel its super easy, dump the water and go.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It’s the second one I’ve owned. The first one was much larger and I bought it many years ago on a TV infomercial The newer smaller version does the same thing, but the workmanship isn’t as good. The top fits a little awkwardly into the water reservoir and it’s easy to topple over. But the curls are still curls
customer_reviews.author: Gary Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Caruso hair rollers had missing rollers
customer_reviews.text: Yes I love them. I have been using this brand for many years. It will always be number 1 for me, This last box I just received Had four missing small rollers and also four missing roller covers with no rollers . I need a total of small rollers. Please send ASAP. Sincerely, Sharon Stephens
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great little hair curler
customer_reviews.text: Curls stay set for days. This is my second Caruso hair setter. The first was so old that I was afraid they weren’t made anymore. I was thrilled to find it on Amazon. I love my Caruso! Doesn’t dry or damage hair. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cole

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! I have tried many kinds of hot rollers
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I have tried many kinds of hot rollers. None of them were able to keep the curls. But this one works! I was suspicious about it being time-consuming, but it's not at all. You have time between rolling each one and that's the time you can use to heat up the rollers. The set of rollers are a lot for a variety of styles. I love it. It keep my thick Asian hair curling for a whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Y

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and I used it for years
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these for Christmas back in the late 80's early 90's ish. It was pink and you had to mix salt with the water. It worked great and I used it for years. I later became a hairstylist and have been now for 13 years. I recently ordered this as it is the only curling product that I have come across that works so quickly (20 mins) offering no heat damage (I also like to use the hair dryer before I drop the curlers) and the curls last so long (2-3 days of corse they fall a bit).
customer_reviews.author: Eveblack

customer_reviews.title: Whose hair does this work on!?
customer_reviews.text: These rollers don’t work at all. Well they do if you want volume and curl for about 20 minutes. I have fine hair that typically responds to rollers well. I thought these would be great for long lasting style with minimal heat damage. Even with my best styling products I couldn't even make it out the door. Oh and the best part - no returns. Didn't see that small, obscure print....
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Caruso for years, this is my go to and it never lets me down. About every two years I have to replace it though, I think the steaming over time wears it out. Nothing else compares to putting curls in that stay! I have super fine hair and this does the trick without hair spray.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Great way to curl hair!
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these rollers for many years and used them almost daily. I passed them on to my daughter and bought myself a new set. The great thing about these rollers is that they do not damage hair. The steam quickly curls hair and infuses moisture instead of drying hair out like curling irons or plain hot rollers. Another thing I love is you can get as much curl as you want. Since I have naturally wavy hair, I just roll my hair, and when I finish rolling, I remove the rollers. I don't leave them in unless I want a tighter curl. Either way, a great set of rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Dream Catcher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these steam rollers since I was a little girl. I’m 39 now. They’re amazing! They not only curl your hair beautifully, but the steam is wonderful for your hair. Makes my hair silky soft. Living in the Nevada desert does some extreme damage to your hair and this helps repair it. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Product is advertised as a fast alternative to using a curling iron. Individual rollers can only be heated one at a time. It took me 2 hours to put all the rollers in my hair. When I took them out - after waiting the required amount of time - there was very little curl in my hair. Rollers ended up ripping out a bunch of my hair when I removed them. Product cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Watson

customer_reviews.title: Works but not well!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but takes too long to use as you can only steam 1 roller at a time. Plastic clips don't hold well & come unrolled or fall off.
customer_reviews.author: CDWR

customer_reviews.title: Best non-damaging rollers/hair setter out there.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these rollers for 25 years now without damaging my very fine, very thinhair. This is the 4th set I have owned. However, I do feel that these rollers and caps aren't fitting quite as tightly as previous sets...i seem to have issues with the cap staying on. I also am not happy that spare rollers are more expensive than buying a whole new steamer with rollers....otherwise I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Echo

customer_reviews.title: Best for curls
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years and recently bought a new set. I have thin, fine hair-these curlers are the best for holding curls all day-just leave in a few minutes and curl will last.
customer_reviews.author: MEK

customer_reviews.title: Love the ease, and love the convenience
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using a Caruso for over twenty years and loved that it’s so easy to use and the convenience of this product. Even though my original was still working just as it did did when it was purchased I still decided to purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST ROLLERS EVER INVENTED
customer_reviews.text: I was in high school when these first came out in the 90's, the salt ionizer version. LOVED THEM THEN. This version doesn't use the salt and is a bit more portable (smaller) and the variation of rollers has greatly improved. Also, it steams faster! However, the overall concept and ease of use is the same. I adore these rollers, short or long hair, course or fine...they will give you plenty of lasting volume withOUT any heat damage. Best of all, they can stand the test of many year. A great hair investment, I must say!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Schnoodle

customer_reviews.title: I have had people that I didn't even know come up to me and tell me how pretty my hair is
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many compliments in the first week I used these rollers.I have had people that I didn't even know come up to me and tell me how pretty my hair is...I have very long hair....the rollers are much kinder to my hair than the old brush rollers I used to have. the only change I would make to this product is to have a separate steam hole for the roller caps......its difficult to place them over the steam while holding the steamed roller.
customer_reviews.author: maolisa mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t heat
customer_reviews.text: I have used Richard Caruso for over 30 years and have loved them. However, these are worthless. They hardly heat at all and I’ve only had them 6 months. These are gray in color and the ones I normally get are red (which I get at Sally Beauty Supply). I don’t know the difference but I will never get the gray again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it works?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just not using them properly... I've tried this two days in a row and both times they gave my hair curls, but the curls only lasted about half an hour before they fell out. And in no way is my hair resistant to being curled--with pin curls and curling irons my hair stays curled for at least 24 hours, if not multiple days. Will be attempting the curls again with smaller sections of hair...
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: It curls!
customer_reviews.text: This steam system works great to curl hair! I've only used the system once so far. I had to use all of the curlers provided... and the end product: my hair was rolled into tight curls (I don't like this at all). I prefer large, looser curls so I don't look like I'm 12. The other downside, it took almost 3 hours to curl my hair. Even worse, it was very difficult getting the curlers out of my hair. It would somehow get tangled and I'd end up ripping some of my hair out of the curlers. Ouch! I don't think I will be using this system again.
customer_reviews.author: shopping junkie

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be returned
customer_reviews.text: I have very flat and fine hair and while the roller curled my hair, the result did not last more than 4 hours even with hairspray. I tried with different size roller with the same result. I wanted to return this product since it doesn't work with my hair but it is NOT eligible for return which is surprising and new information since there's nothing on the website stating that. I do not purchase items solely to return them but I have not encounter a seller refusing returns and does not mentioned that upfront either.
customer_reviews.author: Yang W.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on hard to curl hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair dresser was reminiscing about the Caruso, not thinking it was still made. When I told her I found it, she told me to buy it - and I did. I have not used a steam hair setter in a long time so I am still trying to get the hang of it again. I have been able to get the current curl fad over most of my head but missed a area or two. I can not do this with a curling iron or flat iron. Having bad eye-hand coordination I believe more practice will make for perfect. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannahgram

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: I really do not like this at all. The clips are a pain in the neck to clamp on the roller. I think it takes much too long to finish a set . I would not recommend it.. It would probably be better if someone would stand behind you and do it for you. If your hair is medium length it is not worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cooker

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use! Puts the old hit rollers to shame!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these rollers. They're super easy to use and very comfortable. Drying time takes a bit longer for me because I have very long hair. They provide a nice firm curl that has great staying power.
customer_reviews.author: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade!

customer_reviews.title: Super fast great looking curls
customer_reviews.text: Practically seconds to turn the water into steam. These are great. Takes a minute to throw in your hair and I let them set for about 10 minutes while getting ready for work. These are a life saver. They look great every time. I love that I don’t have to plan my getting ready time around heating up conventional hot rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller does not accept returns
customer_reviews.text: Beware... This is non-returnable even if never used. Purchased as a gift for Mom and she didn't want it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Poppy

customer_reviews.title: How did I live his long and never hear of these steam rollers?!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Get some. Your hair will thank you for not exposing it to hot dry heat any longer. Just don't leave the roller in the steamer pin too long or it will make your hair too wet. Quick, simple to use, with excellent curlability and with curls that LAST! I have thick, wavy, hard to curl hair that and always took a lot of heat ( and time) with hot rollers that damaged my hair. I wonder why these aren't common knowledge. I YouTubed use just to be sure I was using right. Couldn't be easier...and the price is very reasonable. I did buy 6 extra jumbo rollers.
customer_reviews.author: bhelmly

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: i used these probably 20 years ago and stopped using them. i ordered these a few weeks ago and WOW. i love them just as much as i did years ago. if you have trouble using these or your ends don't look right...youtube how to use them. roll your hair as shown and it will come out great!!!
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: Works good except small roller attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Works good except the small rollers attachment don't fit on 50% of the rollers. To big. Falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Curly
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years. There is a little learning curve, but fairly easy to use. The curls last a long time. I have permed hair which gives a lot of body. My hair can stay curly for three days, loosening a little bit each day. Highly recommend. Leaves hair soft and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: The perfect roller set!
customer_reviews.text: My third set...no need to damage your hair with irons or metal core rollers. These are the best I have ever used. Curls your hair with wet heat or steam from water. I leave in for 30 min to get a good curl. Lasts 3 days! If you color your hair these will never dry your hair....love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curls, easy, fast, and safe for kids!
customer_reviews.text: There are quick and easy to put in your hair, and my curls always last all day long with just a little hair spray (doesn't happen with a curling iron, that's for sure). I'm never too frizzy, and I don't use any anti-frizz or heat protecting products. Sometimes my three year old daughter and I curl our hair together with these and it's never too hot against her head. Though, having three year old hair, her curls don't last as long. If your hair is SUPER thin or you're using these for a little girl, try some dry shampoo before you curl-- that might help!
customer_reviews.author: Dhoff

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have been growing out my hair from a very short style for about a year now. It is currently cut in a short, angled wedge that comes to my chin. I was getting so bored with wearing it it straight everyday and wanted to do something different. It took a little practice rolling and learning how to make sure all the ends are tucked in and not crimped because may hair is still fairly short. The rollers create soft curls without the crimp marks sometimes caused by curling irons.
customer_reviews.author: paradise

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, does a great job and won't damage my fine hair. I can roll my daughters' hair and not feel guilty about damaging their hair. The 30 rollers are a real plus! This new model is smaller than the previous pink one and doesn't require salt. I use distilled water, hoping it will prolong the life of the product.Came with a plastic bag for storage.Also, a booklet for achieving different hairstyles has been very helpful. The reason for the 4 star rating instead of 5, is that it is a time consuming process. Heating the roller, rolling the hair, then heating the clip before using it can feel tedious. Generally, the results are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and I used these rollers years ago and we loved them but she had an accident with them and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I used these rollers years ago and we loved them but she had an accident with them and we were hesitant about using them again. The lid to the water basin just sits on top of the basin and while she was rolling up her hair the basin with the hot boiling water fell onto her leg causing a severe burn. There should be some way to secure the lid to the basin so that that does not happen to someone else. I would have given these rollers a give star if the lid was secure to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Senak

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it's worth
customer_reviews.text: Very complicated and not user friendly.. you can only heat one roller at a time and must refill the resovoir ever few minutes.. hate it!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Becker

product_meta.title: Caruso C97953 30 Molecular Steam Hairsetter with 30 Rollers
product_meta.description: Size:30 RollersCaruso C97953 30 Molecular Steam Hairsetter with 30 Rollers
feature_bullets: 30 Foam Rollers Included (6 Petite; 6 Small; 6 Medium; 6 Large & 6 Jumbo) for maximum styling versatility
Dual voltage so you can plug in anywhere – great for traveling.
BONUS storage bag for easy organization and transportation.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
